entry.name: QUnit.reset
entry.title: QUnit.reset()
entry.desc: DEPRECATED: Reset the test fixture in the DOM.

longdesc.p: Note: This method is DEPRECATED. Don't use it!

ul.li: Use multiple tests instead of resetting inside a test.
Use testStart or testDone for custom cleanup.
This method will throw an error in 2.0, and will be removed in 2.1

longdesc.p: Automatically called by QUnit after each test. Can be called by test code, though usually its better to seperate test code with multiple calls to QUnit.test().

When QUnit is run in a browser, it looks for #qunit-fixture element. If found, QUnit will store the contained markup before running any test, then restoring that markup after each test. If tests manipulate elements only within one of those elements, they won't affect each other.
